heroesgrave.utils.math

Class SimplexNoise

  • java.lang.Object
    • heroesgrave.utils.math.SimplexNoise

  • public class SimplexNoise
extends java.lang.Object
    A speed-improved simplex noise algorithm for 2D, 3D and 4D in Java. Based on example code by Stefan Gustavson (stegu@itn.liu.se). Optimisations by Peter Eastman (peastman@drizzle.stanford.edu). Better rank ordering method by Stefan Gustavson in 2012. Multi-Instance modifications by Longor1996. This could be speeded up even further, but it's useful as it is. Version 2012-03-09 This code was placed in the public domain by its original author, Stefan Gustavson. You may use it as you see fit, but attribution is appreciated.
    Author:
    Stefan Gustavson

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimplexNoise(long seed)
      Create's a new Simplex-Noise instance, that can be used for pseudorandom number-generation.
